mapper.update: UPDATE heating heat SET heat.heat_status=1 WHERE heat.open_id=#{openId} AND heat.heat_status=0;
UPDATE heating heat SET heat.heat_status=2,heat.start_time=#{startTime} WHERE heat.open_id=#{openId} AND heat.heat_status=1;
UPDATE heating heat SET heat.heat_status=3 WHERE heat.open_id=#{openId} AND heat.heat_status=2;
mapper.select: SELECT heat.id as heatId,heat.open_id as openId,u.nickname as nickName,u.user_img as imgUrl, heat.start_time as startTime,heat.end_time as endTime,dc.dict_name as heatStatusName,heat.zone as zoneName FROM heating heat INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.open_id=heat.open_id INNER JOIN dict dc ON dc.dict_value=heat.heat_status WHERE dc.dict_type='heat' AND heat.zone=#{zoneName};
